name: Itsy The Spider goes to China

-------------------- reviews --------------
8/10 no matter how many times you fall, you truly do want to get back up again-
TheIphoneappreview.com

8/10 Itsy the Spider is very fun, addicting, and a great value at $0.99!
game-boyz.com

5/5 Must play all night long by Desdw
Very addictive and fun game. I couldn't stop playing. I no longer have a social life, but who cares all I need is Itsy.

5/5 Addicting....seriously by Jackattack55
Amazing and it never stops.. Cool shoes too!

5/5 Great game! Addictive! Fun graphics! by The real SillyMonkey
I love this game!! Fun and addictive and challenging! I really like the music and graphics, too!

5/5 It really is addicting by Katie from Spain
Bought this last week, showed it to my friends at the bar on Friday. It is addicting! We spent over an hour passing around iPhones trying to beat each other's scores. Good game.

5/5 It is the next Doodle Jump by Hammet99
It is really funny. I can’t stop playing.
--------------------- description ----------
You always knew that you'd reach incredible heights, shoot for the stars and have the world at your feet, so you're not going to let the fact that you're a little spider stop you. You only need the spider's web and so many points to surpass the stratosphere to go into orbit.
Accompany Itsy across the miles from flower to flower, take in the scenery while helping the spider tackle numerous obstacles along the way.

FEATURES:
-Flowers of all colors. Discover the function of each one.
-New themes coming, now Itsy goes to NYC!
-Looking for new challenges? Try unlocking all the achievements.
-Local and global competitions - challenge your friends!

HOW TO PLAY:
Touch an object and keep your finger on the screen to start ascending. The longer you hold the touch the faster you’ll climb. Avoid falling down the bottom of the screen or getting too close to dangerous objects.

Thousands of players have reached the stars, how about you?
